Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hills Hotel in Moscow (Ramenki), you'll be convenient to Memorial Mosque and Moscow State University. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Museum of the Great Patriotic War and Church of St. George.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 guestrooms.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Hills Hotel.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Hills Hotel.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 guestrooms.

With a stay at Hills Hotel in Moscow (Ramenki), you'll be convenient to Memorial Mosque and Moscow State University. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Museum of the Great Patriotic War and Church of St. George.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Memorial Mosque - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Museum of the Great Patriotic War - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Church of St. George - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Poklonnaya Gora Memorial - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Victory Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Moscow State University - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Park Pobedy - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Victory Square - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Triumphal Arch - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Sparrow Hills - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Battle of Borodino Panorama Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Luzhniki Stadium - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Metro Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Novodevichy Convent and Cemetery - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Natalya Sats Musical Theater - 3 km / 1.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Moscow (VKO-Vnukovo Intl.) - 18.9 km / 11.7 mi
Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 28.4 km / 17.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hills Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
